about.body:
From December 20-23, we are serving a very special menu for one of our favorite Italian-American traditions: 

Feast of the Seven Fishes! 

Head to the [menu](https://cafemarsbk.com/menu/feast%20of%20the%20seven%20fishes/ "menu") section for more information on food, and then [book it](https://www.exploretock.com/cafemarsbk/ "book it!")!
